Stern School of Business        Liberal Studies Program      NYU Abu Dhabi      NYU Shanghai      Polytechnic School of Engineering      Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service          School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law        School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                             Search      go                                                New York University              New York University              University Registrar                                                     Calendars                             Course Search                             Registration                              Academic Records                                       Request Official Transcript                Request Unofficial Transcript                Enrollment Verification                Check My Grades                Grading Information                   Transcript Information                   Manage Guest Users on Albert                                                                       Graduation                             Veterans Benefits                             University Policies & FERPA                          Forms & Procedures                          Training Guides                         Home          |         Academic Records             |          Official Transcripts                                    Official Transcripts                 An official transcript is a comprehensive record of a student's academic progress at New York University. The NYU Registrar issues official transcripts in two formats:      Signed & sealed paper transcript (no fee)    Secure PDF electronic transcript ($3.25 processing fee)       Important Transcript Information      Transcripts contain confidential academic information and are released in accordance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (FERPA), and therefore will not be issued without authorization from the student/alumnus .    Students/alumni at NYU Graduate Stern School of Business or NYU School of Medicine must contact their school records office.    E-Transcripts are not available for students who attended NYU prior to 1990.       How to Request an Official Transcript      Instructions for students who attended after 2001 and have a valid NetID    Instructions for students who are unable to access Albert, do not have a NetID or who attended prior to 1990       Questions? Contact Us      Fax: (212) 995-4154    Mail: Office of the Registrar        Academic Records        P.O. Box 910        New York, NY 10276-0910      Email: academic.records@nyu.edu (please make sure to include your signed form or     letter as an attachment)              Current and Former Students Attending After 2001:     If you attended NYU after 2001 and are able to access NYUHome/Albert, you can request an official paper or electronic transcript from the Albert Student Center. The Request official transcript link can be found under the My Academics section of Albert Student Center.    Transcripts cannot be produced for anyone whose record has been put on hold for an outstanding University obligation.    Tip: Before you complete your request, check to ensure that all your grades have been posted. If you are a recent graduate, also check to ensure that your degree has been posted. You can view all posted grades and ensure that your degree has been recorded by viewing your unofficial transcript .     SPECIAL HANDLING: If your request requires special handling, you must request a paper transcript using the Secure Online Transcript Request Form . Specify your special handling instructions in the comments field at the bottom of the form. Special handling includes:      Sending paper transcripts to yourself in separate sealed envelopes addressed to admissions offices of other universities.    Sending paper transcripts with additional documents to be sent along with the NYU transcript. Additional documents can be sent to our office via fax, mail, or email. Please include your transcript request number on all correspondence.    FedEx: the express mail service provider used by the Registrar's Office is FedEx. Please note that requesting documents to be sent via FedEx does not guarantee the processing time. All requests are processed in the order in which the requests are received.    A. Complete a FexEx Shipping Label . The address in the "From" section should be as follows: Your Name, NYU, 105 E.17th Street, NY, NY 10003 (the address where the package is originating from).     B. Send the request form and the label as attachments to academic.records@nyu.edu .             Undergraduate students please note:   Your academic advisor is a critical resource for making important academic decisions. Be sure to consult with your advisor if you are considering attending a summer session or study abroad program at another university or if you are considering transferring out of NYU to complete your degree elsewhere.                 Former students unable to access Albert, don't have a NetID, or who attended prior to 1990:    Paper transcript requests: Complete the Online Transcript Request Form and mail, fax, or email the signature page to our office. A signed consent form is required.    Electronic transcript requests: order directly from NSC .    SPECIAL HANDLING: If your request requires special handling, you must request a paper transcript using the Secure Online Transcript Request Form . Specify your special handling instructions in the comments field at the bottom of the form. Special handling includes:      Sending paper transcripts to yourself in separate sealed envelopes addressed to admissions offices of other universities.    Sending paper transcripts with additional documents to be sent along with the NYU transcript. Additional documents can be sent to our office via fax, mail, or email. Please include your transcript request number on all correspondence.    FedEx: the express mail service provider used by the Registrar's Office is FedEx. Please note that requesting documents to be sent via FedEx does not guarantee the processing time. All requests are processed in the order in which the requests are received.    A. Complete a FexEx Shipping Label . The address in the "From" section should be as follows: Your Name, NYU, 105 E.17th Street, NY, NY 10003 (the address where the package is originating from).     B. Send the request form and the label as attachments to academic.records@nyu.edu .         There is no limit for the number of official transcripts that can be issued to a student. Indicate in your request if you would like us to forward the transcripts to your home address, but we still require the name and address of each institution you are requesting transcripts for.    If you initiate your transcript request through the online transcript request form , you will receive email confirmation from our office when we receive your signed request form. If you have any questions or concerns please contact our office at (212)998-4280 and a representative will assist you.                                   Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved. Stern School of Business        Liberal Studies Program      NYU Abu Dhabi      NYU Shanghai      Polytechnic School of Engineering      Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service          School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law        School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                             Search      go                                                New York University              New York University              University Registrar                                                     Calendars                             Course Search                             Registration                              Academic Records                                       Request Official Transcript                Request Unofficial Transcript                Enrollment Verification                Check My Grades                Grading Information                   Transcript Information                   Manage Guest Users on Albert                                                                       Graduation                             Veterans Benefits                             University Policies & FERPA                          Forms & Procedures                          Training Guides                         Home          |         Academic Records             |           Official Transcripts               |          Official Electronic Transcripts                                        Official Electronic Transcripts                 Students and Alumni now have the option of requesting Official Electronic Transcripts!   New York University has partnered with the National Student Clearinghouse (NSC) to give students the option of ordering an electronic transcript online. Students and Alumni can order a secure PDF version of their official transcript to be sent to themselves or others.    AMCAS & LSAC Transcripts: Electronic transcripts are accepted by the American Medical College Application Service and Law School Admission Council.    Restrictions   When requesting paper or electronic transcripts:       Students matriculated at NYU Graduate Stern School of Business or NYU School of Medicine must contact their school's record office directly    Academic records prior to 1990 will not be available on electronic transcripts, students must request a paper transcript    Transcripts cannot be produced for anyone whose record has been put on hold for an outstanding University obligation    Special handling requests such as the inclusion of additional documents with transcript will not be possible with electronic transcript delivery      Cost and Order Requirements   The electronic transcript request order is handled by NSC and costs up to $3.25 for each transcript recipient specified on the order. Several universities have signed up for NSC's Electronic Transcript Exchange (ETX) service. Transcript delivery to these universities has a reduced cost of $2.25 and does not require requesters to provide any recipient email address. NSC currently accepts Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover credit/debit cards for payment. Requesters will only be charged for the order payment when the transcript has been generated.    Order Process   Current and former students who attended NYU after 2001 can start the order process from Albert. The Request official transcript link can be found under the My Academics section of Student Center. When ordering from Albert, a signed consent form is not required. Other former students can order directly from NSC .   Once an order has been placed, requesters will receive two confirmation emails from NSC that confirm the receipt of the order and consent form. Another email will be sent when the transcript has been generated and sent to the recipient(s). For recipients that are not part of NSC's ETX service, two emails are sent that provide the user name and password needed to retrieve the secure PDF transcript. Once the recipient downloads the transcript, a notification email is sent.   All recipients have 30 days to retrieve transcripts. Requesters will receive periodic notifications for each recipient that has not retrieved their transcript.    Tip: Before you complete your request, check to ensure that all your grades have been posted. If you are a recent graduate, also check to ensure that your degree has been posted. You can view all posted grades and ensure that your degree has been recorded by viewing your unofficial transcript .      If you have any questions regarding transcripts, please contact us .                            Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved. Designed by The Office of the Registrar and the Office of Web Communications     Copyright Communication | Important Notice | Feedback
